reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Dr. Thompson is an amazing professor. Her lectures are clear, and she always makes time to help students during office hours.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Dr. Rivera is very knowledgeable, but his exams are tough. Make sure to attend his review sessions.

reviews.subject: Cybersecurity
reviews.review: Dr. Lee knows her stuff, but sometimes her explanations can be confusing. Overall, a decent class.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Brown's lectures are hard to follow, and he rarely responds to emails. I struggled in this class.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Patel is fantastic! Her passion for biology is contagious, and she makes even difficult topics easy to understand.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Dr. Davis is very engaging and brings history to life. His exams are fair, but you need to stay on top of the readings.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez's lectures are disorganized, and her grading is inconsistent. I wouldn't recommend her class.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Taylor is awesome! He makes psychology fascinating and is always willing to help students. One of the best professors I've had.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Morgan is very knowledgeable and provides great feedback on essays. Her class is challenging but rewarding.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Dr. Wilson's lectures are dry, and he moves through the material too quickly. I had a hard time keeping up.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. White is passionate about sociology and really cares about her students. Her classes are both informative and enjoyable.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Dr. Green's class is interesting, but his grading is strict. Be prepared to think deeply and write a lot.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Dr. Carter is an excellent professor who encourages discussion and critical thinking. Her lectures are engaging and informative.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Dr. Moore's explanations are confusing, and his homework is overwhelming. I struggled to understand the material.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Harris is incredibly passionate about art history and shares that enthusiasm with her students. Her class is both fun and educational.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Young's class is well-structured, and he provides real-world examples that make the material more relatable. His exams are fair.

reviews.subject: French
reviews.review: Dr. Scott's class is challenging, but she is very supportive. Be prepared to participate a lot in French.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Dr. Evans is knowledgeable and brings a lot of interesting perspectives to the subject. His class is well worth taking.

reviews.subject: Business Management
reviews.review: Dr. Hill is one of the best professors I've had. She brings real-world experience into the classroom, and her lectures are always interesting.

reviews.subject: Accounting
reviews.review: Dr. Ramirez knows his subject well, but his teaching style can be dry. The material is challenging, but he provides good resources.
